report.title: My surveys
report.query: select #columns# from cache_samples_functional s join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=s.id left join cache_samples_functional sc on sc.parent_sample_id=s.id join groups_users gu on gu.user_id=s.created_by_id and gu.deleted=false join groups_users guadmin on guadmin.group_id=s.group_id and guadmin.administrator=true and guadmin.deleted=false where s.website_id in (#website_ids#) and s.parent_sample_id is null and guadmin.user_id=#auth_user_id#

param.name: auth_user_id
param.description: ID of the user to show surveys for

column.name: draft
column.sql: case s.record_status when 'I' then 'Draft' else null end
